scripts.build:server: npm --prefix server run build || echo "(no server build script)"
scripts.build: echo "[BUILD] installing client deps" && npm run ci:client && echo "[BUILD] building client" && npm run build:client && (test -d server && echo "[BUILD] installing server deps" && npm run ci:server && echo "[BUILD] building server" && npm run build:server || echo "[BUILD] no server dir; skipping")
